== Mathur -I (627688) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Mathur -I is a village in the [[Alathur]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 1283 hectares and harbouring 3011 households with total population of 12975 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 15 km. Male population is 6296 and female population is 6679. Scheduled Caste Population is 3356 and Scheduled Tribes population is 8. Census Location Code of the village is 627688<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 10110 (77.92%)
* Literate male population: 5218 (82.88%)
* Literate female population: 4892 (73.24%)
